Description: Papyrus with 7 lines of Coptic text written along the fibres (recto). Mounted with EA 75306, 75305, 75304, 75302, 75301.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118081) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118081)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
